idea-plugin.name: equals参数类型检查
idea-plugin.description:
• check java.lang.Objects equals method params type ,if not match,idea will show the error line

  • could reduce Objects.equals(a,b) error params type by mistake

  • notice:this plugin can only inspect your code,it's just reminder java developers,but don't impact code execution,and never change or fix your code.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• github:qiuhuanhen,project name :objects-equals-inspect

  • beta version.csdn:孟秋与你

  • the first beta version,welcome,update date:2024.01.09
